ygData.subject: Re: whats the deal with the last name thing?BIG Deal !!
ygData.msgSnippet: yea.... yea... LKW... i wondered what last name u gonna get.... kekekekkekeke.... i was just thinking of using the old SilverHand thats all ... Nicademous ...
ygData.messageBody:
yea.... yea... LKW... i wondered what last name u gonna get....
kekekekkekeke.... i was just thinking of using the old SilverHand thats all
:)

Nicademous
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 7:32 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] whats the deal with the last name thing?BIG Deal
!!


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Hehe, yes it's true, u will get ya 2nd name when you reach lvl 20, u need
> to page a GM to do that. I was there when Leshrec got his 2nd name, and
> I've confimed with GM that it MUST be ONE word, but can be separated by a
'
> sign, eg Ziltus De'GuaiLan ;)
>
> U may wanna use Nicademous De'SiaLan, hahahahahahah!
>
>

> wrote:
